text: Cardi B and Offset picked up a pair of matching Lamborghinis over the weekend, and showed them off in matching Instagram posts. The famous hip - hop couple leaned on the hoods of their new cars in a picture that they both posted on Instagram. Cardi B picked up a powder blue Aventador while Offset's was bright green. Both had their suicide doors in the upright position. ( Photo : Instagram / Cardi B )'' Blessed & Gifted,'' Cardi wrote with a heart emoji in the color of each car. ` ` Official Lamb owners.'' She tagged the photo ` ` Aventador,'' ` ` His & Hers'' and ` ` Kulture parents.'' ` ` L A
